course_description: The course helps students develop concentration, observation skills, storytelling, spontaneity, and physical and vocal technique. Students also gain practical experience applying these tools to the presentation of openings and closings as well as questioning witnesses and jurors.
prerequisites: LAW 632X and LAW 671 and LAW 959 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
